means: 突出地支持（某一政党）的
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 班纳 Bannerman的同源词

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均有"旗"之意。
means: flag ： 普通用词，含义最广，多指有彩色图案，悬挂于旗杆或绳索上的长方形旗帜，或国旗，也可指单位或组织的旗。
banner ： 比较庄重文雅的用词，指表示象征性的旗帜，如常用于指党旗或代表某种主义的旗。

word_mean: 在一个网页页面上建立的文本滚动超文本标记语言（HTML）标志。页旗是网络广告的主要形式，通常放在页面的顶部，比如页面标题。

sentence.Network_en: Lucy had strung a banner across the wall saying "Welcome Home Daddy".
sentence.Network_cn: 露西在墙上挂了一条横幅，上面写着“欢迎爸爸回家”。

sentence.Network_en: All countries march as one nation under the banner of friendship.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有国家在友谊的旗帜下团结一致，共同前进。

sentence.Network_en: I felt the banner rip as we were pushed in opposite directions.
sentence.Network_cn: 当我们被推向相反的方向时，我感觉横幅被撕裂了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 横幅（Banner）是网络媒体中最普遍的推广宣传方法，一般刊登于页面最醒目的开始位置，利用文字﹑图片或动态效果把推广的信息 …

考研英语常见词根的来历(词源) - 豆丁网 ... bad 坏相区分如： banner 旗帜 bandage 绷带.

jx.jx_en_mean: claiming to support a specified cause or set of ideas

lj.lj_ly: campaigns fought under the banner of multiculturalism.
lj.lj_ls: 打多元文化旗号的运动。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old French baniere, ultimately of Germanic origin and related to band

encyclopedia.content: 可以是网站页面的横幅广告，也可以是游行活动时用的旗帜，还可以是报纸杂志上的大标题。Banner主要体现中心意旨，形象鲜明表达最主要的情感思想或宣传中心。

entry.tran: （通常指在抗议或集会中用两根竿子撑开的）横幅，标语
entry.def: A banner is a long strip of cloth with something written on it. Banners are usually attached to two poles and carried during a protest or rally.

example.ex: ...a large crowd of students carrying banners denouncing the government...
example.tran: 一大群高举谴责政府的条幅的学生

example.ex: A big banner was draped across one of the streets saying, 'Idaho Falls Says NO to Drugs.'
example.tran: 一条写有“爱达荷福尔斯市拒绝毒品”的大横幅悬跨其中一条街道。

entry.tran: 在…的旗帜下；为了…的事业（或信仰）
entry.def: If someone does something under the banner of a particular cause, idea, or belief, they do it saying that they support that cause, idea, or belief.

example.ex: All countries march as one nation under the banner of friendship.
example.tran: 所有国家在友谊的旗帜下团结一致，共同前进。

example.ex: Under the banner of education, we herd our children from ballet to basketball and back again.
example.tran: 打着教育的旗号，我们赶鸭子上架似的让孩子从芭蕾到篮球，不停地学这个学那个。

means.word_mean: 1. long strip of cloth for decoration or advertising
2. a newspaper headline that runs across the full page

list.explanation: [无业游民用语]流浪街头无处过夜

example.en: I have carried the banner in in-fernal metropolises.
example.zh: 我曾在一些地狱般的大都市整夜流浪街头。

sentences.en: a banner year for the company

jushi.english: Welcoming banners hung across the streets.
jushi.chinese: 欢迎的横幅悬挂在街道上。
